title: (x) Magnify - Myriad {Marc O}
content:
I'd wager that this is one of the lighter weights of Myriad.   
   
Frutiger and FF Transit are very similar, but lack the splayed M.
author: marcox

comments.content: [Myriad Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111122841/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/F/MYRP/F_MYRP-10005000.jhtml) looks plausible, but it might be an artificially bolded [Myriad light](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111122841/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/F/MYRP/F_MYRP-10003000.jhtml).
